episodes.title: The Beasts of Satan: A Cult of Murder, Betrayal, and Ritual Sacrifice
episodes.description:
Between 1998 and 2004, a group known as the Beasts of Satan terrorized northern Italy with ritualistic murders fueled by drugs, heavy metal, and twisted occult beliefs. What began as a subculture of rebellious youth quickly spiraled into a series of brutal killings that shocked the nation. Led by Andrea Volpe and Nicola Sapone, the group lured their victims—sometimes friends—into the depths of horror, leaving behind a trail of blood, deception, and shattered lives.

The story of the Beasts of Satan is one of betrayal, manipulation, and blind devotion to a belief system that justified unspeakable acts. It is a reminder of how ordinary people, under the right circumstances, can transform into monsters.
